治.definition: to rule; to govern; to manage; to control; to harness (a river); to treat (a disease); to wipe out (a pest); to punish; to research

治保.definition: law enforcement and protection of the public (as provided in the PRC by local security committees 治保會|治保会[zhi4bao3hui4])

治喪.definition: to organize and carry out a funeral

治國理政.definition: to manage state affairs; to govern the country

治外法權.definition: diplomatic immunity; (history) extraterritoriality, the rights (under unequal treaties) of a foreigner to live in China outside Chinese jurisdiction

治多.definition: Zhidoi County (Tibetan: 'bri stod rdzong) in Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 玉樹藏族自治州|玉树藏族自治州[Yu4 shu4 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

治多縣.definition: Zhidoi County (Tibetan: 'bri stod rdzong) in Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 玉樹藏族自治州|玉树藏族自治州[Yu4 shu4 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

治大國若烹小鮮.pinyin: zhi4 da4 guo2 ruo4 peng1 xiao3 xian1
治大國若烹小鮮.definition: ruling a large nation is like cooking a small delicacy (idiom); effective government requires minimal intervention

治學.definition: scholarship; high-level study; to do scholarly research; to pursue a high level of study

治愚.definition: to eliminate backward (unscientific) ways of thinking

治本.definition: to tackle a problem at its root; to effect a permanent solution (contrasted with 治標|治标[zhi4biao1])

治標.definition: to treat only the symptoms but not the root cause

治標不治本.definition: to treat the symptoms but not the root cause

治理.definition: to govern; to administer; to manage; to control; governance

治病救人.definition: to treat the disease to save the patient; to criticize a person in order to help him

治療.definition: to treat (an illness); medical treatment; therapy

治癒.definition: to cure; to restore to health; uplifting; heartwarming

治絲益棼.definition: lit. try to straighten out silk threads only to tangle them further (idiom); fig. to try to help but end up making things worse

治裝.definition: to prepare necessities (chiefly clothes) for a journey abroad

治裝費.definition: expenses for 治裝|治装[zhi4 zhuang1]

治軍.definition: running of armed forces; military management; to govern armed forces; to direct troops
